TopicTitle: I just wanted someone to celebrate with

Articles.Content:
After an hour and a half of slooooooooooooowly edging the first two parts of my very first space station together I have finally completed my first docking!! I was so excited and wanted to jump around and cheer with someone, sadly I'm on my own (I still jumped around and cheered by myself of course ) that's the entire point of this post.

Yay me! Loving the new SAS in .21 aswell
I am with you man! its been 4 months sincie my very first one and that took me 3 weeks, did it today in a fraction of the time, and with a quad docking port setup! love this game man!

mission report section

my bad I was just so excited I posted in here lol as for pictures I'll get one or two up at some point, still don't know how to do that isn't learning fun!
Nice! You'll find that rendezvous and docking are much easier after you've done it a few times. Good luck with your future missions!
Woo! Good job, the first one of many, I hope!
I did my 2nd docking today, right before 0.21 came out. I remember how hard the first one was, good job!
Congrats! It just gets easier from here. Looking forward to pics.

Bravo! Docking is pretty much a requirement for going anywhere very far beyond Kerbin with enough stuff to make it more than a 5-minute flag plant and photo op. You've opened the door to a wider solar system
Where are the pics? That's the best part.

Have now completed 5 launches and dockings on the LKO Gas'n'Go and finally remembered to take a screenshot, its uploaded to imgur, how do I put that image into a post so y'all can have a looksie?

Edit: never mind, figured it out
